original_title: Wizard So So: Fun Magical Adventure
overview: Two stories: When Kitty the Cat struggles to rid Farmer Fred's barn of the three mean-spirited rat bullies that have been stealing food and causing trouble, Wizard So So steps in to lend the feline a magical helping hand. In the second story of this charming animated adventure, Wizard So So comes to the aid of his friend the Dragonfly, who dreams of turning into an actually flying dragon..
tagline: So So Fun You'll Won't Want It To Stop
title: Wizard So So: Fun Magical Adventure
